senses.sense_definition: Made from or containing grain that has been processed into malt.

examples.text: The recipe calls for <w>malted</w> flour to add a distinct flavor to the bread.
Brewers use <w>malted</w> barley as the primary ingredient in beer production.

senses.sense_definition: A milkshake made with malted milk powder.

examples.text: He ordered a chocolate <w>malted</w> and a burger at the diner.
The classic vanilla <w>malted</w> was served with whipped cream on top.

senses.sense_definition: Simple past and past participle of <w>malt</w>.

examples.text: The farmers <w>malted</w> the grain before selling it to the local brewery.
Once the barley was <w>malted</w>, it was ready for the fermentation process.
